Publicity

Below is a list of the places in which VizSec has publicized itself in the past.

Mailing Lists

  • VizSEC - info@lists.vizsec.org
  • Infovis - infovis@infovis.org
  • FloCommunity mailing list - flocommunity@cert.org
  • IFIP TC 11 - ifip-tc11@dlist.uni-frankfurt.de
  • DBWorld
  • IEEE ComSoc Technical Committee on Computer Communications
  • Spafford's list: ias-opportunities@cerias.purdue.edu

Websites

  • Computer Security Conferences
  • WikiCFP
  • VRVis (email step@vrvis.at)
  • Infovis-Wiki (wiki)
  • SecViz.org (form)
  • Computer Graphics Conferences Wiki (email beovar at gmail.com to add conference)
  • ACM (form)
  • IEEE (email calendar@computer.org)
  • IEEE Cypher (email cipher-cfp@ieee-security.org)
  • Usenix (email other_events@usenix.org)
  • International Association for Cryptologic Research Calendar (form)

Get in Touch

Email questions to vizsec2016@easychair.org, or you can post to our Google group.

Follow @vizsec on Twitter!
